node.display_long_description:
IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE
Experience a thrilling FPS action adventure story told across three chapters.

You're the last agent alive able to stop Dr Monday and save the world! Slay the zombie hordes using a high-tech visor, insane gadgets and an arsenal of Z-shredding weapons.

Team up with former CIA operative Billy-Bob and his daughter Celia-Jane as you delve deep into the true madness of Dr Monday’s nefarious schemes of world domination!

HACK AND SLASH
Alongside impressive firepower, get up close and personal with the zombie horde with all new melee weapons! Hack off limbs and hurl axes at the shuffling undead. Deflect spitter slime with baseball bats and hit a zombie head for a home run! All this and much, much more. 

DUAL-WIELD WEAPONS
In Drop Dead Dual Strike, you can wield two weapons at once. Double the firepower, double the damage!

EXCITING MULTIPLAYER
Team up with a friend in horde mode and hold back the undead together!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
A brand new quality of life update to Drop Dead is here, this update focuses on addressing some widely reported issues on the title:

- We’ve fixed Oculus party voices sometimes being suppressed causing you not to be able to hear your friend.
- Fixed an issue that required an internet connection to play the game
- Fixed avatar mouth syncing
- Fixed an issue where players sometimes experience beeping or static sound in Multiplayer matches
- Upgraded to the latest versions of both Oculus and Unity which should see some performance gains on all devices
- Fixed many other smaller issues called out in customer reviews

Known Issues:

- We're aware of an issue causing Oculus avatars to appear incorrectly in Multiplayer

What’s next?

Development for Drop Dead is in full swing once again and the team is cooking up something brand new for Multiplayer to scratch that itch for more Z slaying action. Keep your eyes, ears and VR set open, the update will arrive soon.

nodes.title: Drop Dead Bug Fix & Quality of Life Update
nodes.body_text:
A brand new quality of life update to Drop Dead is here, this update focuses on addressing some widely reported issues on the title:

- We’ve fixed Oculus party voices sometimes being suppressed causing you not to be able to hear your friend.
- Fixed an issue that required an internet connection to play the game
- Fixed avatar mouth syncing
- Fixed an issue where players sometimes experience beeping or static sound in Multiplayer matches
- Upgraded to latest versions of both Oculus and Unity which should see some performance gains on all devices
- Fixed many other smaller issues called out in reviews

Known Issues:

- We're aware of an issue causing Oculus avatars to appear incorrectly in Multiplayer

What’s next?

Development for Drop Dead is in full swing once again and the team is cooking up something brand new for Multiplayer to scratch that itch for more Z slaying action. Keep your eyes, ears and VR set open, the update will arrive soon.

node.reviewDescription:
I’ve been holding off writing a review for awhile. I truly love playing this game. I play it every weekend. I usually play multiplayer because I love the horde mode and it’s even more fun when you play with others. My only problem for this game is that sometimes I can’t drop the weapon I’m holding it just sticks. I also noticed that whenever I reach wave 18 and if I get mobbed by zombies it seems like there’s a glitch or the game freezes up. My only other issue is with reloading my gun, lots of times it will say weapon malfunction or the gun tends load slowly. 

I also think we should be able to wear two guns at all times or maybe we could earn some of the heavier machine guns when we get to round 15, since that’s when things get intense. 
Other than that I love this game.

One more thing, it would be great if 3 to 4 people could play this game on multiplayer.

Update: I still love this game, but what did you guys do on this new update. Multiplayer is all screwed up and I live for multiplayer. The game doesn't recognize when both players are in the game, instead, it tells us waiting for players. Hopefully, you'll have this issue fixed quickly. I spent so much time yesterday trying to play the game. This is my go to game, as I only like playing on multiplayer. So please 🙏 fix this quickly.

Update: what’s going on with this game. I keep having issues on horde mode. The game keeps disconnecting players while playing the game. Each person will see that the other person has disconnected when that’s not the case. When can we get this fixed? No matter how many games I buy this is still my favorite go to game. I play this game more than any game on my quest.

website_page_meta.description: Welcome to the Zombie apocalypse.  Strap on an array of guns that would make Rambo, Wick and the Terminator jealous and go to war on the Z heads in this full on, non stop, action shooter.
website_page_meta.title: Drop Dead: Dual Strike Edition · Oculus Quest
